member.summary: General symbol color scheme to use.
Gets the raster symbol that corresponds to the given parameters.
member.param: The unique code of the symbol.
Scale to use when generating symbol.
Indicates whether the symbol should use drop shadow effect.
The color to use for drop shadows.
Parameters used by specific renderers, typically extracted from the style of the element to render

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.Symbols.Contracts.Providers.IRasterSymbolProvider.BaseSymbolScaling
member.summary: The base symbol scale factor to use.

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.Symbols.Contracts.Storage.RasterSymbol.CenterX
member.summary: Relative placement of symbol center/hotspot [0-1] relative to top left [0.5, 0.5] places center in ver/hor center. [0.5, 0.0] places center at the middle top.

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.Symbols.Contracts.Storage.RasterSymbol.CenterY
member.summary: Relative placement of symbol center/hotspot [0-1] relative to top left [0.5, 0.5] places center in ver/hor center. [0.5, 0.0] places center at the middle top.
